import React from 'react'; export default function HomePage() { return (

The Fade

The global directory of Black barbershops.

For the backpacker and the businessman.

For the student, the diplomat, the dad.

Wherever you go, find a barber you can trust.

Join the Movement

We’re building the largest community-powered database of Black barbers in the world — and we need you.

  • Submit a barbershop: Know a great shop? Add it to our directory.
  • Search barbers by city: Launching soon in London, NYC, and Lagos — and expanding fast.
  • Leave a review: Know a trusted and reliable barber?

Why The Fade?

Barbershops are more than businesses. But finding the right one in a new place can be hard — until now.

The Fade is a living archive of barbers who understand Black hair — from tight coils to clean tapers.

All listings are reviewed for accuracy, and barbers can request updates anytime.

Featured Barbershops (preview)

  • • Chop City, Brixton – ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
  • • The Taper Lounge, Brooklyn – ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆
  • • Classic Cuts, Accra – ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

[ View Full Directory ] (coming soon)

Community Guidelines • Contact Us • Request Removal • © 2025 The Fade

); }
